Package primitives

Class Color

java.lang.Object
primitives.Color
public class Color
extends java.lang.Object
Wrapper class for java.jwt.Color The constructors operate with any non-negative RGB values. The colors are maintained without upper limit of 255. Some additional operations are added that are useful for manipulating light's colors
Author:
Dan Zilberstein

  • Field Summary

    Fields
    Modifier and Type Field Description
    static Color BLACK  

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor Description
    Color​(double r, double g, double b)
    Constructor to generate a color according to RGB components Each component in range 0..255 (for printed white color) or more [for lights]
    Color​(java.awt.Color other)
    Constructor on base of java.awt.Color object
    Color​(Color other)
    Copy constructor for Color

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    Color add​(Color... colors)
    Operation of adding this and one or more other colors (by component)
    java.awt.Color getColor()
    Color getter - returns the color after converting it into java.awt.Color object During the conversion any component bigger than 255 is set to 255
    Color reduce​(double k)
    Scale the color by (1 / reduction factor)
    Color scale​(double k)
    Scale the color by a scalar
    Color setColor()
    Color setter to reset the color to BLACK
    Color setColor​(double r, double g, double b)
    Color setter to generate a color according to RGB components Each component in range 0..255 (for printed white color) or more [for lights]
    Color setColor​(java.awt.Color other)
    Color setter to take components from an base of java.awt.Color object
    Color setColor​(Color other)
    Color setter to copy RGB components from another color

    Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

    equals, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • getColor

      public java.awt.Color getColor()
      Color getter - returns the color after converting it into java.awt.Color object During the conversion any component bigger than 255 is set to 255
      Returns:
      java.awt.Color object based on this Color RGB components

      Parameters:

      Returns:
